reviewText: My favorite part was in the beginning were he talks about chi flow thru the back , arms and neck. Subtitles went by to fast but form works well.
This is the best tai chi video tutorial I have ever experienced! The trainer explains each movement in English (no subtitles), and he does it so well. I am going to use this video tutorial daily
Just watching this guy move can teach one so much about tai chi and internal movements.  Watch and listen (or read) carefully.

This is the first of a 3 DVD set from china that feature very detailed instruction by Chen stlye taiji grandmaster Chen Xiao Wang in the Chen style silk reeling energy exercises.  The instruction is in chinese but has English language subtitles.
